description: The sweeping package provides help for workers, businesses and a health care system pushed to the brink by the coronavirus.
content:
Washington — The Senate passed a $2 trillion coronavirus stimulus package late Wednesday night. The vote was 96 - 0.
It was approved almost 24 hours after Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell announced on the Senate floor shortly after 1 a.m. Wednesday tha… [+4630 chars]

author: BBC News
title: Coronavirus row helps topple Kosovo government
description: The ruling coalition implodes over differences on how to fight the pandemic, with no clear way forward.
content:
Image copyrightReutersImage caption
 Prime Minister Albin Kurti has been at odds with his coalition partners
The government of Kosovo has collapsed after a vote of no confidence in Prime Minister Albin Kurti was backed by a majority of MPs.

author: William Roberts
title: US Senate approves $2 trillion coronavirus rescue bill
description: The largest economic relief bill in history heads to the House, where it must pass before landing on Trump's desk.
content:
Washington, DC - The United States's Senate overwhelmingly approved a $2 trillion economic rescue bill on Wednesday to help lift the economy and address the coronavirus pandemic. 
The Senate vote ratifies a political agreement between leading Senate Democrat… [+5657 chars]

author: Cristina Marcos
title: Hoyer says House expects to pass Coronavirus bill on Friday | TheHill
description: House Majority Leader Steny Hoyer (D-Md.) announced late Wednesday night that he expects the chamber will pass an economic relief bill in response to the coronavirus later in the week in a way that won’t require all members to travel back to Washington.

author: Adam Cooper
title: No more jail, just self-isolation for dad, 69, who shot daughter in head
description: Great-grandfather who shot daughter with shotgun then spent 15 months on remand is to be freed after judge found age put him at risk of contracting coronavirus.
content:
There are no known cases of coronavirus in Victorian jails but Justice Rita Incerti said the risk posed to Madex was an important and unprecedented factor in sentencing.

author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
title: Fear drives $2 trillion economic rescue bid -- and sparks calls for the next one
description: Even $2 trillion is not enough to dispel fears stalking Washington that the coronavirus crisis could pull down the economic foundation on which American life depends.

title: Dow Futures Sink After Senate Approves Trump's Coronavirus Stimulus Bill
description: Dow futures tumbled in overnight trading on Wednesday, as investors awaited a Senate vote on a $2 trillion stimulus package.
content:
• Dow Jones futures were off by as much as 252 points Wednesday night.

author: Sean Moran
title: Senate Unanimously Passes Historic Coronavirus Relief Package
description: The Senate passed the largest emergency relief bill that would provide aid to Americans suffering from the coronavirus.
content:
The Senate passed a substantial emergency relief bill on Wednesday night that would provide aid to small businesses, hospitals, and Americans suffering from the impact of the coronavirus outbreak.
